response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and craftsmanship. Given its significance, I am offering you the chance to own it for $850,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth while providing you with an exceptional value. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 850000}
